title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. V, subch. B, pt. 337 - Leave Of Absence For Employees In The Professional Service
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. V, subch. B, pt. 337 - Leave Of Absence For Employees In The Professional Service

State Regulations
§ 337.1 - Definitions

Title A - Vacation Leave: Calendar Year Employees and College Year Employees (§ 337.2 to 337.5)

Title B - Vacation Leave: Academic Year Employees (§ 337.6)

Title C - Sick Leave (§ 337.7 to 337.12)

Title D - Holiday Leave (§ 337.13 to 337.17)

Title E - Sabbatical Leave (§ 337.20 to 337.26)

Title F - Other Leaves (§ 337.27 to 337.29)

Title G - Disability Leave (§ 337.30)

Title H - Study Leaves for the Chancellor and Chief Administrative Officers (§ 337.31 to 337.32)

Title I - Attendance Records (§ 337.33)

Title J - Other Absences (§ 337.34 to 337.35)

Title K - Limitations (§ 337.36)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. V, subch. B, pt. 337

Statutory authority: Education Law, §§353, 355, 355-a; Civil Service Law, § 167[a][2]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
